00029 #ifndef LUBYK_INCLUDE_MIMAS_APPLICATION_H_
00030 #define LUBYK_INCLUDE_MIMAS_APPLICATION_H_
00031 
00032 #include "mimas/mimas.h"
00033 #include "mimas/Callback.h"
00034 
00035 #include <QtGui/QApplication>
00036 #include <QtGui/QDesktopWidget>
00037 #include <QtCore/QTimer>
00038 
00039 #include <iostream>
00040 
00041 using namespace lubyk;
00042 
00043 namespace mimas {
00044 
00054 class Application : public QApplication, public ThreadedLuaObject {
00055   Q_OBJECT
00056 public:
00059   Application();
00060 
00061   enum ApplicationType {
00062     Desktop,
00063     Plugin,
00064   };
00065 
00069   static LuaStackSize MakeApplication(lua_State *L) {
00070     // <'type'>
00071     ApplicationType type = Desktop;
00072     if (lua_isstring(L, 1)) {
00073       std::string str(lua_tostring(L, 1));
00074       if (str == "plugin") {
00075         type = Plugin;
00076       }
00077     }
00078 
00079     if (type == Plugin) {
00080       // avoid qt_menu.nib loading
00081       QApplication::setAttribute(Qt::AA_MacPluginApplication, true);
00082     }
00083 
00084     Application *app = new Application();
00085     app->luaInit(L, app, "mimas.Application");
00086     // <app>
00087     return 1;
00088   }
00089 
00090   ~Application() {
00091     MIMAS_DEBUG_GC
00092   }
00093 
00096   void setQuitOnLastWindowClosed(bool quit) {
00097     QApplication::setQuitOnLastWindowClosed(quit);
00098   }
00099 
00100   // Destructor method called when the object goes out of Lua scope
00101   virtual void dub_destroy() {
00102     luaCleanup();
00103     deleteLater();
00104   }
00105 
00108   int exec();
00109 
00113   void processEvents(int maxtime);
00114 
00115   // Maybe this could be used for automated testing.
00116   // void postEvent(QObject *receiver, QEvent *event) {
00117   //   QApplication::postEvent(receiver, event);
00118   // }
00119   
00120 
00123   static pthread_key_t sAppKey;
00124 
00126   static void terminate(int sig);
00127 
00128   void quit() {
00129     QApplication::quit();
00130   }
00131 
00132   void setStyleSheet(const char *text) {
00133     QApplication::setStyleSheet(QString(text));
00134   }
00135 
00138   LuaStackSize screenSize(lua_State *L) {
00139     QRect rect = desktop()->geometry();
00140     lua_pushnumber(L, rect.width());
00141     lua_pushnumber(L, rect.height());
00142     return 2;
00143   }
00144 
00145   virtual bool event(QEvent *event);
00146   
00149   void singleShot(int msec, QObject *receiver, const char *member) {
00150     QTimer::singleShot(msec, receiver, member);
00151   }
00152 };
00153 
00154 } // mimas
